name: test_e2e_with_logs[137_PATH_WIN_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_WIN_002` |
| **Name** | Windows double backslash traversal |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | windows_traversal |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `..\..\`
- **Encoded**: `..%5C..%5C`
